name: 蔣勇南
objective: 本課程旨在強化學生口語表達及溝通能力，開拓知識領域以及培養學生的國際觀。由逐步短句，段落至長途步口譯，循序漸進。從入門訣竅如讀稿技巧，筆記要領密集訓練及模擬演練。範圍涵蓋經貿，金融，時事，科技，產業等。
schedule:
Week	Skills 
1	Introduction
2	History, Concepts, & T vs. I
3	Public speaking: T & I Schools
4	Oralizing texts
5	Paraphrasing I
6	Paraphrasing II
7	Paraphrasing III
8	Paraphrasing IV
9	Mid-term Exam
Week	Skills
10	Sight translation I
11	Sight translation II
12	Sight translation III
13	Numeric Conversion
14	Sight translation IV
15	Sight translation IIV
16	Sight Translation IIV
17	Reviews
18	Final Exam
scorePolicy: 1 Exams: Mid-term 30 %, Final 30%; 2 Quizzes 20 %; 3 Participation & homework 20%;
